item.title: about
item.description: 👩🏻‍💻🐰🕳️ I’m a software engineer who loves writing code, investigating tricky bugs down rabbit holes and helping others above all things. 📚🧮 I have a background in theoretical computer science but I wish I had studied pure maths. 💬🗺️ I’m a polyglot at heart, trying to be a polyglot in real life too. I like learning many different programming languages, even in absurd ways, and different human languages as well.
